Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Palm Cove Tropic Apartments in Palm Cove, you'll be by the sea and minutes from Palm Cove Beach and close to Cairns Tropical Zoo. This 4-star apartment is within the vicinity of Clifton Beach and Half Moon Bay Golf Course.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 20 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private patios. 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, laundry facilities, and a library. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Palm Cove Tropic Apartments in Palm Cove, you'll be by the sea and minutes from Palm Cove Beach and close to Cairns Tropical Zoo. This 4-star apartment is within the vicinity of Clifton Beach and Half Moon Bay Golf Course.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palm Cove Beach - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Cairns Tropical Zoo - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Clifton Beach - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Half Moon Bay Golf Course - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Yorkeys Knob Beach - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Kuranda Koala Gardens - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Tjapukai Cultural Park - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Skyrail Rainforest Cableway - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Cattana Wetlands - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Tjapukai Aboriginal Cultural Park - 11.3 km / 7 mi
Hartley's Crocodile Adventures - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi
Great Barrier Reef - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi
Barron Gorge National Park - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi
Skydive The Reef Cairns - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi
Mount Whitfield Conservation Park - 18.2 km / 11.3 mi

The preferred airport for Palm Cove Tropic Apartments is Cairns, QLD (CNS-Cairns Intl.) - 16.7 km / 10.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
